name: SlideMeeting
short_description: SlideMeeting is a web-based application where you run an online powerpoint presentation to your audience, and only you (as the presenter) are able to control the navigation.  As you move your slides forward (or backward) using the navigation button (next/previous), your audience shall view the slide which you are currently showing.  In this way, you can present your slides and gives a ‘talk’ through the Chat Box about the current slide that you are displaying.  The Chat Box also allow you to interact with your audience.
